page.title: 14CLUBS SALTFORD WEST OF BATH
page.content: {Young People's Organisations Cubs and Scouts, 7 - 16 years membership 150 approx. Guides and Brownies, 7-16 years, membership 120 approx.Youth groups (mixed) associated with St.Mary's church.Young people's club (mixed) Evangelical Church. {Over 60 Club} Meets weekly on Friday for most of the year. {Out Door Activities} Tennis (3 hard courts) Football Two teams. Cricket Two teams Golf course 18 holes (very popular) Riding club Saltford Walkers (average 5-10 walks in scenic areas)
